name: @media-network/media-webapp
description: A web app that allows tenants register and configure their MediaNetwork CDN presets.
author: LongLH <d@dapps.me>

scripts.install:all: npm i && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.dev: concurrently --raw "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run lint:watch"
scripts.lint:watch: nodemon --watch client --watch server --ext js,jsx --exec "npm run lint"
